sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>reject</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Transform Supplier V2 - Supplier Location">0cb5aca687756950ecfb322e0ebb35f5</map><reference_value_field>sys_id</reference_value_field><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	//gs.info("Vendor Number "+source.account_number_of_vendor_or_creditor);
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_fin_supplier');
    gr.addQuery('erp_company_code', source.account_number_of_vendor_or_creditor);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next) {
        return gr.getUniqueValue();
    }

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>sn_sap_data_int_supplier_stg</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prama</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-28 10:42:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf7a74a687b56950ecfb322e0ebb353b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP" source="sn_sap_data_int">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Primary Data Integration with SAP">93c7f5cb875a1950fd73642d0ebb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_bf7a74a687b56950ecfb322e0ebb353b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Prama</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-30 03:19:11</sys_updated_on><target_field>supplier</target_field><target_table>sn_slm_m2m_location</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
